original_text: And when the mourning was past, David sent and fetched her to his house, and she became his wife, and bare him a son. But the thing that David had done displeased the Lord.
korean_text: 그 장례를 마치매 다윗이 사람을 보내 그를 왕궁으로 데려오니 그가 그의 아내가 되어 그에게 아들을 낳으니라 다윗이 행한 그 일이 여호와 보시기에 악하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when the mourning was past
David sent and fetched her to his house
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 그녀를 자기 집으로 데려오기 위해 사람을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: But the thing that David had done
